item.title: 7.1-Magnitude Earthquake Strikes China’s Tibet Region Near Nepal Border
item.description: Chinese state media said at least 95 people had died in the 7.1-magnitude quake near one of Tibet’s holiest cities. It was felt in neighboring Nepal.
